trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the name of the associated property is displayed with parentheses in the Properties window.
trans-unit.target: 指示是否使用在属性窗口中的括号显示关联属性的名称。

trans-unit.source: A ParenthesizePropertyNameAttribute with a <xref:System.ComponentModel.ParenthesizePropertyNameAttribute.NeedParenthesis%2A> value of `true` indicates to the Properties window that the associated property should be displayed with parentheses around its name.
trans-unit.target: 与 ParenthesizePropertyNameAttribute<xref:System.ComponentModel.ParenthesizePropertyNameAttribute.NeedParenthesis%2A>值`true`指示属性窗口关联的属性，应显示用圆括号括其名称。</xref:System.ComponentModel.ParenthesizePropertyNameAttribute.NeedParenthesis%2A>

trans-unit.source: The Properties window displays a property with parentheses around its name near the top of the list in alphabetical mode, or near the top of its category if the Properties window is in categorize mode.
trans-unit.target: 属性窗口中按字母顺序排列的模式下，显示带有列表的顶部附近，其名称两边的括号的属性或其类别顶部附近属性窗口是否处于分类模式。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ParenthesizePropertyNameAttribute"></xref> class that indicates that the associated property should not be shown with parentheses.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.ComponentModel.ParenthesizePropertyNameAttribute"></xref>指示用括号应不显示关联的属性的类。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ParenthesizePropertyNameAttribute"></xref> class, using the specified value to indicate whether the attribute is displayed with parentheses.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.ComponentModel.ParenthesizePropertyNameAttribute"></xref>类，使用指定的值以指示是否用括号所显示的属性。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the name should be enclosed in parentheses; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果名称应括在圆括号内;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ParenthesizePropertyNameAttribute"></xref> class with a default value that indicates that the associated property should not be shown with parentheses.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.ComponentModel.ParenthesizePropertyNameAttribute"></xref>使用默认值，该值指示应使用括号显示关联的属性的类。

trans-unit.source: Compares the specified object to this object and tests for equality.
trans-unit.target: 比较指定的对象与此对象和测试相等。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if equal; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果相等;，否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets the hash code for this object.
trans-unit.target: 获取此对象的哈希代码。

trans-unit.source: The hash code for the object the attribute belongs to.
trans-unit.target: 属于对象属性的哈希代码。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the current value of the attribute is the default value for the attribute.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示该属性的当前值是否为该属性的默认值。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the current value of the attribute is the default value of the attribute; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果该属性的当前值是默认值的属性;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the Properties window displays the name of the property in parentheses in the Properties window.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示是否属性窗口显示在属性窗口中的括号属性的名称。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the property is displayed with parentheses; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果该属性将显示与圆括号内;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。
